ESBMessagePipelineStorage.Name: Save Raw Message
ESBMessagePipelineStorage.PipelineBlob: <ESBMessagePipeline xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.neuronesb.com/pipelines/"><Category>General</Category><Description i:nil="true" /><GlobalProperties xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" /><Name>Save Raw Message</Name><Properties xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" /><ReferencedAssemblies xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" i:nil="true" /><Steps><ESBMessagePipelineStep xmlns:d3p1="http://schemas.neuronesb.com/pipelines/esb/" i:type="d3p1:EsbMessagePublishPipelineStep"><Bindings xmlns:d4p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><BreakPoint>Disable</BreakPoint><Disable>false</Disable><Name>Save Raw Message</Name><Uniquename /><d3p1:Semantic>Multicast</d3p1:Semantic><d3p1:TopicSelector i:type="d3p1:ESBMessageConstTopicSelector"><d3p1:Topic>SaveRawOutputFile</d3p1:Topic></d3p1:TopicSelector><d3p1:_timeout>60</d3p1:_timeout></ESBMessagePipelineStep></Steps></ESBMessagePipeline>
